attributes.title: 2016 BMW 1 Series 118i 5-dr Auto

attributes.description:
Introducing the All-New Haval H6 Hybrid Electric Vehicle (HEV), the first-ever self-charging Haval Hybrid in South Africa. Under the H6 HEV’s stylish hood is the responsive Petrol Engine with decreased fuel consumption of only 5.2L/100km that produces 113kW/233Nm and Battery Power of 139kW/300Nm, this produces a combined output of 179kW and 530Nm of torque. Standard features include -: 
Electronic Parking Brake (EPB), Auto Hold, Driving Mode (Standard, Eco, Sports, Snow), Speed Sensitive Electric Steering, Launch Control, Gloss Black Accents with Sports Rear Spoiler, 19 Sports Alloy Wheel, Auto Lift Tailgate, Panoramic Sunroof, Rain-Sensing Wipers, Wireless Charger
Keyless Entry and Push Button Start, Heated Front Seats, Ventilated Front Seats, Heated Steering Wheel, 10.25 Inch Colour Combination Instrument, Driver Seat 6 Way Electric Adjust, 7 Airbags: Dual + Side + Curtain Airbags + Front Centre, Child Safety Lock and Isofix, Electronic Stability System (ESC) and Traction Control (TCS), Anti-Roll System (RMI) + Secondary Collision Mitigation (SCM)
Cornering Brake Control (CBC) and Brake Assist (BA), Hill Decent (HDC) and Uphill Assist (HHC)
Tyre Pressure Monitoring System (TPMS), Front and Rear Parking Sensors, Fully Automatic Parking System, Reverse Memory Assistance, 360 Degree Camera with Panoramic View, Adaptive Cruise Control (ACC) with Intelligent Cruise, Intelligent Cornering and Traffic Jam Assist, Pre-Collision Warning and Automatic Emergency Braking (AEB Pedestrian and Cyclist), Lane Departure Warning (LDW), Lane Keeping Assist (LKA) and Lane Centre Keeping (LCK), Traffic Sign Recognition (TSR)
Blind Spot Detection with Rear Cross Traffic Alert and Lane Change Assist, Head-Up Display
Driver Fatigue Alert, 12.3" Colour Multi-Touch Screen, Bluetooth Connectivity, Carplay and Android Auto, LED Headlights and Taillamps, Service Plan 5year/60 000km, Warranty 5year/100 000km, Hybrid Battery Warranty 8year/150 000km
